scripts.clean: rimraf cypress/reports && rimraf cypress/videos && rimraf cypress/screenshots
scripts.cy:run: npm run clean && npx cypress run
scripts.cy:run:report: npm run clean && npx cypress run --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=reporter-config.json
scripts.cy:run:headed: npm run clean && npx cypress run --headed
scripts.report:generate: marge cypress/reports/mochawesome/merged-report.json --reportDir cypress/reports/html --inline --charts --reportPageTitle 'AMP Cypress Test Report' --reportFilename index.html
scripts.report:full: npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate
scripts.test: npm run cy:run:report && npm run report:full
scripts.test:ci: npm run clean && npx cypress run --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=reporter-config.json
